<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Makeshift Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=6444) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 221 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Weapon Improviser](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=269)

**Prerequisites**
[Weapon Improviser Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6440)

</column>

---

You quickly snatch up whatever is nearby and then attack with it as an improvised weapon. You Interact to pick up an unattended object in reach you could use as an improvised weapon, then [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) with that improvised weapon.
name: Makeshift Strike
